name: Andean New Age
description: Takes heavy influence from Indigenous Andean Music, emphasizing a peaceful and harmonious atmosphere and often using the flute.

name: Celtic New Age
description: Represented in its most known style by a mysterious blend of subliminal sounds, ambient beats, and angelic and ethereal female vocals.

name: Native American New Age
description: Takes heavy influence from Indigenous North American Music, emphasizing a peaceful and harmonious atmosphere and utilizing chants, drumming, and flutes.

name: Neoclassical New Age
description: Strongly influenced by and sometimes also based upon early music and the Baroque Music or Classical Period.

name: New Age Kirtan
description: American development of Kirtan, fusing it with New Age and Western music.

name: Tibetan New Age
description: Incorporates perceived elements of Tibetan Music, particularly singing bowls.
